data.title: Senior Software Engineer
data.description: I currently work for Raytheon Technologies as a Senior Software Engineer. I am also the Technical Lead on a project and line manage a number of other developers.

data.title: Lead PLM Developer
data.description: My first role in Software Development was at BAE Systems. I progressed from Developer to Lead PLM Developer over the course of 7 years.

data.title: Technical Support Specialist
data.description: I spent the early part of my career in IT working as a Technical Support Specialist.
